ED_Title: Closing date of the seventy-fifth session of the General Assembly
ED_DecisionText: At its 102nd plenary meeting, on 9 September 2021, the General Assembly, on the proposal of its President  (A/75/L.133),  decided to postpone the closing date of the seventy-fifth session of the Assembly to Tuesday, 14 September 2021.
ED_Disclaimer: The final text of this decision will be contained in document A/75/49 (Vol. III) after editorial review.
